critique: The document concerns the revocation of a previous executive order regarding public lands in Wyoming and their subsequent opening for entry under homestead and desert land laws, prioritizing ex-service men of the War with Germany. There is no explicit discussion of social issues, economic policy, or civil liberties. Therefore, many of the axes are neutral. The prioritization of ex-service men could be seen as slightly conservative in the sense of favoring a specific group based on past service.
